title: AquaFunded 45%
description: AquaFunded, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in December 2023, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $200,000. Supported platforms include MetaTrader 5 (MT5), MetaTrader 4 (MT4), cTrader, Match Trader and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include Forex, indices, commodities and cryptocurrencies; leverage is stated as 1:100 for Forex, 1:20 for indices and commodities, and 1:2 for cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Maximum Loss Per Trade Policy (Instant/Aquaman): Floating PnL cannot exceed -2% (or -1% for >$300k) of balance -> Permanent Closure.
Wave Stop (Funded): Open trades incurring 2% loss -> Soft breach/auto-close.
Excessive Risk-Taking: High percentage of account balance on single trade or overlapping trades.

payout_policy.processing_time: 14 days payout frequency for all listed programs.
payout_policy.details: Instant: 40% (Standard) or 15% (Pro) consistency. 1-Step Pro/2-Step Pro: 25% consistency. Aquaman: 15% consistency. Withdrawal Caps for 200k+: First two rewards capped at $10k each.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed, personal accounts only. PF1 partnership allows copying across different firm accounts.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed, implied by 'All or Nothing' and 'Excessive Risk' rules not explicitly banning EAs, but check for specific strategy bans.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: All accounts deactivated after 30 days of inactivity. Cannot be restored.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed with restrictionsâ€”trading within 5 minutes before/after high-impact news prohibited on funded. Allowed effectively on evaluation.
forbidden_strategies: Maximum Loss Per Trade Policy (Instant/Aquaman): Floating PnL cannot exceed -2% (or -1% for >$300k) of balance -> Permanent Closure.
Wave Stop (Funded): Open trades incurring 2% loss -> Soft breach/auto-close.
Excessive Risk-Taking: High percentage of account balance on single trade or overlapping trades.

seo_content:
AquaFunded Technical Infrastructure

AquaFunded, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in December 2023, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $200,000. Supported platforms include MetaTrader 5 (MT5), MetaTrader 4 (MT4), cTrader, Match Trader and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include Forex, indices, commodities and cryptocurrencies; leverage is stated as 1:100 for Forex, 1:20 for indices and commodities, and 1:2 for cryptocurrencies. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
